last_episode_to_air.name: Future Time
last_episode_to_air.overview: Graduation day: one of life's chapters ends and another begins as the students and teachers of Class 3-E go on to forge their own paths in the world.

name: Assassination Classroom
overview: The students of class 3-E have a mission: kill their teacher before graduation. He has already destroyed the moon, and has promised to destroy the Earth if he can not be killed within a year. But how can this class of misfits kill a tentacled monster, capable of reaching Mach 20 speed, who may be the best teacher any of them have ever had?

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Class 3E and while some things have changed, the class assignment is still the same: kill their teacher before the end of the year.  Easier said than done since Koro Sensei's made it clear he won't go down without a fight.

episodes.name: Assassination Time
episodes.overview: A creature who blasted the moon into a crescent shows up at Kunugigaoka Junior High School--and he's giving the students a year to assassinate him!

episodes.name: Baseball Time
episodes.overview: The reasoning behind the E Class's segregation is revealed. Nagisa tracks Koro Sensei's weak points in the hopes of using them to take him down.

episodes.name: Karma Time
episodes.overview: The brilliant, belligerent Karma Akabane, Nagisa's former classmate, joins 3-E and immediately jumps into the assassination mission with both feet.

episodes.name: Grown-Up Time
episodes.overview: A new foreign-language teacher comes to 3-E with some major ulterior motives... among other things. Will she get any closer to killing Koro Sensei?

episodes.name: Assembly Time
episodes.overview: Before the torturous school assembly begins, Okuda attempts to poison Koro Sensei in an unexpected way... with unexpected results.

episodes.name: Test Time
episodes.overview: Time for midterms! Koro Sensei gives his aspiring assassins an ultimatum as they battle a grueling test and the disdain of the rest of the school.

episodes.name: School Trip Time, First Period
episodes.overview: The students go on a school trip to Kyoto, where they must still keep assassination foremost in their minds. Kanzaki faces trouble from her past.

episodes.name: School Trip Time, Second Period
episodes.overview: The E Class gives a pro sniper plenty of chances to take down Koro Sensei, then try to make the most of what's left of their school trip to Kyoto.

episodes.name: Transfer Student Time
episodes.overview: A new student joins the E Class with a singleminded focus on assassination that drives her classmates to distraction. Koro Sensei to the rescue!

episodes.name: L and R Time
episodes.overview: Irina is greeted by her former master, retired assassin Lovro, who thinks she should give up as she has no chance of killing Koro-sensei.

episodes.name: Transfer Student Time, Second Period
episodes.overview: Class 3-E prepare for the arrival of their second transfer student, who is allegedly more powerful than Ritsu.

episodes.name: Ball Game Tournament Time
episodes.overview: A baseball tournament is to be held, in which Class 3-E are forced to play an exhibition match against the top players of the school's baseball club, which Sugino used to be a part of.

episodes.name: Talent Time
episodes.overview: As Karasuma briefly senses what appears to be a fearsome aura coming from Nagisa, Akira Takaoka, an aquaintance of Karasuma from the Ministry of Defense, is sent to Class 3-E to take over Karasuma's role as P.E. teacher.

episodes.name: Vision Time
episodes.overview: Koro Sensei exposes a major weakness, and Terasaka interrupts a fun summer day out with an assassination attempt that goes a little too far.

episodes.name: End-of-Term Time
episodes.overview: For finals, Koro Sensei gives his class a new goal--with an irresistible reward. The E Class makes its own deal with the top-tier A Class's Big Five.

episodes.name: School's Out - First Term
episodes.overview: After two days of exams, the results are in. Both the ace A Class and the end E Class must come to terms with the outcome--and so must Koro Sensei.

episodes.name: Island Time
episodes.overview: The E Class trains intently under a pro killer to prepare for their island assassination. Once there, they must make sure everything falls into place.

episodes.name: Action Time
episodes.overview: The summer assassination attempt is followed by a crisis affecting nearly half the E Class. Can the rest think and move fast enough to save them?

episodes.name: Pandemonium Time
episodes.overview: The E Class must put their lessons into practice as they tackle an intimidating hotel brimming with baddies--and all without Koro Sensei's help.

episodes.name: Karma Time, Second Period
episodes.overview: Karma must use his head to get past a formidable foe. Nagisa goes undercover as the E Class continues to sneak its way to the hotel's top floor.

episodes.name: XX Time
episodes.overview: The students take on one last assassin opponent before meeting the shadowy figure who's holding the virus remedy hostage in exhange for Koro Sensei.

episodes.name: Nagisa Time
episodes.overview: Before Nagisa completely gives into his anger, Terasaka throws a stun-gun at him, urging him not to become a murderer and think about what's truly important.

episodes.name: Summer Festival Time
episodes.overview: Koro Sensei and his students try some matchmaking at the end of their island trip. Class 3-E's eventful summer ends with a taste of pure festival fun.

episodes.name: Kaede Time
episodes.overview: Kaede comes up with a delicious plan of attack, Class 3-E plays an intense game of Cops and Robbers, and Koro Sensei is accused of a serious crime.

episodes.name: Itona Horibe Time
episodes.overview: Koro Sensei faces off against the powerful, tentacled Itona and his handler Shiro yet again, revealing more of his teaching philosophy along the way.

episodes.name: Spinning Time
episodes.overview: Itona endears himself to the boys in Class 3-E as he shows off his assassination creation. The students call each other code names for an entire day.

episodes.name: Leader Time
episodes.overview: Competition between the elite A Class and downtrodden E Class heats up at the school sports festival, with Isogai's livelihood hanging in the balance.

episodes.name: Before & After Time
episodes.overview: After an accident, the E Class winds up doing a whole different kind of studying off campus. But will they have a chance to bone up for the midterms?

episodes.name: Reaper Time, Part 1
episodes.overview: A well-intentioned act leads to a falling-out with Professor Bitch. Soon the E Class finds itself facing off alone against a formidable assassin foe.

episodes.name: Reaper Time, Part 2
episodes.overview: When Koro Sensei and Mr. Karasuma reach the Reaper's hideout, it's anyone's guess who'll come out on top--especially with wild-card Irina in the mix.

episodes.name: Round Two Time
episodes.overview: The students consider their future career options. Nagisa struggles to come to terms with his talent; meanwhile, his mother has her own plans for him.

episodes.name: School Festival Time
episodes.overview: Each class at Kunugigaoka Academy is competing for the highest sales totals in the school festival. How can the E Class even hope to stand a chance?

episodes.name: End-of-Term Time - Second Period
episodes.overview: It's exam time again, and the cream-of-the-crop A Class is a bigger threat than ever before. Top-ranking Asano, however, has something up his sleeve.

episodes.name: Think Outside the Box Time
episodes.overview: The end-of-term exams come down to one doozy of a final problem. Principal Asano comes to Koro Sensei with a little wager that has a lot riding on it.

episodes.name: Let Live Time
episodes.overview: Principal Asano recalls his first foray into the world of education. In the drama festival, the E Class puts on a play with a few unexpected twists.

episodes.name: Secret Identity Time
episodes.overview: Following the drama festival, the E Class learn that one of their classmates is hiding a big secret connected to Koro Sensei's past!

episodes.name: Confession Time
episodes.overview: Koro Sensei begins to come clean about his background after a tense and terrifying encounter with a student who has her own reasons to kill him.

episodes.name: Past Time
episodes.overview: Following the traumatic story of Koro Sensei's past, the E Class is left reeling after learning revelations about his past deeds and identity. As the gather themselves with this new information, it begins to affect their assassination plans.

episodes.name: Discord Time
episodes.overview: The E class is divided over whether to kill Koro Sensei or try to save him. Koro Sensei suggests a way of settling the issue between the two sides.

episodes.name: Outcome Time
episodes.overview: The battle amongst the E-Class comes down to the final two on each side: Karma vs. Nagisa. But, a new obstacle throws a wrench into the E Class's plans.

episodes.name: Outer Space Time
episodes.overview: Class 3-E has agreed to try and save Koro Sensei. In order to do this, they must track down confidential information -- information that takes the class to another height.

episodes.name: Valentine's Day Time
episodes.overview: Nagisa remains uncertain about his future as high-school entrance exams loom over him. It's time for Class 3-E to celebrate Valentine's Day!

episodes.name: Trust Time
episodes.overview: It's time for the last project from Koro Sensei before the E-Class closes out the year, but the government's own plans and threatens to get in the way.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday Time
episodes.overview: The students fight to see their teacher one last time. A figure from Koro Sensei's past arrives with a serious grudge against the super-creature.

episodes.name: Final Boss Time
episodes.overview: A pitched battle between two super-creatures threatens to harm the students of Class 3-E. Can Koro Sensei protect them while fighting for his life?

episodes.name: Graduation Time
episodes.overview: Time is running out, and the E Class students must decide once and for all whether to kill the teacher who so changed their lives over the past year.

episodes.name: Future Time
episodes.overview: Graduation day: one of life's chapters ends and another begins as the students and teachers of Class 3-E go on to forge their own paths in the world.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Class 3E and while some things have changed, the class assignment is still the same: kill their teacher before the end of the year.  Easier said than done since Koro Sensei's made it clear he won't go down without a fight.
